agriculturalenhancements.crop_manager.in:
Fuel-powered machine that plants crops and fertilizes soil up to 9 blocks away behind itself.
Consumes fertilizer more efficiently than hand-use.
Tills soil up to 9 blocks away when using the Farmer's Wrench
agriculturalenhancements.crop_manager.wr: Crouch-right-click with the Farmer's wrench to till soil up to 9 blocks away
agriculturalenhancements.farmer_wrench.i:
Punch machines to disassemble them without losing fuel or broken down ingredients.
Right-click rotatable blocks to rotate.
Crouch-right-click to interact or repair applicable machines
agriculturalenhancements.fertiliser.info: Used most efficiently with the Crop Manager
agriculturalenhancements.fertiliser.till: Hold in off-hand when using a hoe to create Tilled Soil
agriculturalenhancements.fertilizer_prod:
Fuel-powered machine that breaks down ingredients into macro-nutrients.
Produces fertilizer whenever enough macro-nutrients are present (%d of each).
Breaks ingredients into macro-nutrients; produces fertilizer
Requires %d of each macro-nutrient to produce 1 fertilizer
Crouch-right-click with the Farmer's wrench to vent some nutrients (at a cost)
agriculturalenhancements.fuel_excess.inf: Will consume fuel that would exceed the fuel storage only when unable to work otherwise (potentially wasteful with high-value modded fuels).
agriculturalenhancements.harvester.info:
Fuel-powered machine that harvests crops up to nine blocks away from itself.
Optionally uses an item to determine drops but doesn't damage the item.
agriculturalenhancements.harvester.info_: Harvests crops up to 9 blocks away
agriculturalenhancements.harvester.nonde: Harvesting destructively - requires replant after each harvest
Harvesting non-destructively where possible - no need to replant
agriculturalenhancements.harvester.wrenc: Crouch-right-click with the Farmer's wrench to toggle between harvest modes (replant vs no replant)
agriculturalenhancements.irrigation_cont:
Fuel-powered machine that pressurizes irrigation pipes up to 15 blocks away from itself.
Connects through the back or top.
Requires a water source block underneath but won't consume it.
Pressurizes irrigation pipes; requires water-source below
agriculturalenhancements.irrigation_pipe:
Used in irrigation systems to keep soil moist and speed up crop growth.
Requires an Irrigation Controller to remain pressurized.
agriculturalenhancements.soil.info:
Like dirt, but has moisture and nutrition information.
Tills into Tilled Soil.
agriculturalenhancements.sprayer_pipe.in:
Sprayer component of irrigation systems.
Cannot be placed within 2 blocks of another sprayer.
Connect with Irrigation Pipes.
Place no higher than %d blocks above crops.
agriculturalenhancements.tilled_soil.fer: Is created when using a hoe instead of farmland
Requires fertilizer in off-hand to create when using a hoe
agriculturalenhancements.tilled_soil.inf:
Like farmland, but has moisture and nutrition information.
Moisture passes naturally between soil (including tilled)
agriculturalenhancements.watering_can.in:
Holds 1 bucket worth of water.
Speeds crop growth and irrigates soil.
Works in a 3x3 area.
config.jade.plugin_minecraft.agricultura: Agricultural Enhancements Crop Manager Jade Plugin
Agricultural Enhancements Fertilizer Producer Jade Plugin
Agricultural Enhancements Irrigation Pipe Jade Plugin
